titles.title: Teach Me, O LORD, the Perfect Way

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Teach me, O LORD, the perfect way of Thy precepts divine, and to observe it to the end I shall my heart incline.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Give understanding unto me, that I Thy law obey; with my whole heart shall I observe Thy statutes night and day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In Thy lawâ€™s path make me to go; delight therein I find. Unto Thy truth, and not to greed, let my heart be inclined.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Turn Thou away my sight and eyes from viewing vanity; and in Thy good and holy way be pleased to quicken me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Confirm to me Thy gracious Word, which I did gladly hear, to me Thy servant, LORD, who am devoted to Thy fear.

verse.name: v6
